settings.heroSummary: I build scalable blockchain systems and lead technical teams. Focused on DeFi protocol architecture, trading infrastructure, and secure smart contract design.
settings.aboutText:
I'm a Senior Web3 Engineer and Technical Lead with deep experience building production DeFi infrastructure, trading systems, and smart contract architecture.

My work spans protocol design, Layer 2 scaling, and cross-chain integrations. I've led engineering teams through design, implementation, and mainnet launches.

I focus on clean architecture, security-first development, and shipping systems that scale.

experiences.description: Lead development of core smart contract suite and oracle integrations. Designed and implemented cross-chain bridge security model. Mentored 4 engineers.
Built low-latency trading systems and risk engines. Owned architecture for order execution and settlement pipelines.
Developed and audited rollup contracts. Implemented state transition logic and fraud proof integration.

projects.title: DeFi Lending Protocol
projects.description: Permissionless lending and borrowing with isolated pools and risk parameters.
projects.impact: Launched on mainnet; $2M+ TVL in first quarter.

projects.title: Cross-Chain Bridge Relayer
projects.description: Relayer service for asset transfers between EVM chains with monitoring and alerting.
projects.impact: Processed 50k+ transactions with zero security incidents.

certifications.title: Certified Smart Contract Developer
certifications.description: Security and best practices for Solidity development.
